item.title: Vyatta VC5 - Snort alerts to syslog
item.description: I’m running a Vyatta vyatta router at home - in my opinion it’s pretty near “enterprise grade”, and I’m running the Community/Core (read: no-cost and almost all Free) on commodity hardware with great performance. Granted, I’m still on the older version (5 as opposed to the …
item.dc:creator: admin
